title: Shinario-dōri ni Taijō Shita no ni, Imasara Nan no Goyōdesu ka? - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Broken Engagement   Character Growth   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Otome Game   Reincarnation   Unlucky Protagonist   Villainess Noble Girls

description: In response to the annulment of her engagement from the Prince, Christiane got off the stage of the Otome Game. In a certain town’s inn and restaurant, where the commoner girl Chris works, the royal prince and his entourage came for some reason…>
